TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AppearanceEditorPart extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart
Public NotInheritable Class AppearanceEditorPart Inherits EditorPart

summary.span: 提供一个编辑器控件，最终用户使用该控件可以编辑关联 控件的几个用户界面 (UI) 属性。

span.span: Provides an editor control that enables end users to edit several user interface (UI) properties on an associated control.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 类是派生自类的编辑器控件 ，用于编辑影响关联的 或其他服务器控件的外观的属性。The class is an editor control that derives from the class, and is used to edit properties that affect the appearance of an associated or other server control. 控件使最终用户能够编辑控件的多个 UI 属性 。The control enables end users to edit several UI properties of a control. 显示在页面中用于编辑每个属性值的控件类型在下表的相邻单元中列出。The type of control that appears in the page to edit each property value is listed in the adjacent cell of the following table. |属性Property|用于编辑属性的控件Control used to edit property| |--------------|-----------------------------------| ||控件用于设置标题的文本。A control is used to set the text for the title.| ||控件用于选择使用哪种类型的标题和边框选项。A control is used to select what type of title-and-border option is used.| ||控件用于选择内容在页面上的流动方向。A control is used to select the direction that content flows on the page.| ||控件用于设置高度的数字， 使用控件来选择单元。A control is used to set a number for the height, and a control is used to select the units.| ||控件用于设置高度的数字， 使用控件来选择单元。A control is used to set a number for the height, and a control is used to select the units.| ||控件用于指示控件是否处于隐藏状态。A control is used to indicate whether the control is hidden.| 仅当 Web 部件页面处于编辑模式时，以及在 选择特定控件进行编辑时，控件才变为可见。The control becomes visible only when a Web Parts page is in edit mode, and when a specific control has been selected for editing. 与所有其他 控件一样，控件驻留在某个 区域中。The control, like all other controls, resides in an zone. > [!IMPORTANT] > 区域只能包含 控件，而 不能将控件置于任何其他类型的区域中。An zone can contain only controls, and controls cannot be placed in any other type of zone. 类具有最小的一组属性。The class has a minimal set of properties. 属性用于获取或设置在控件可见时作为标题显示的字符串。The property is used to get or set a string that is displayed as a title when the control is visible. 属性从控件设置继承的属性 ，以便在控件内接收焦点的默认控件与 基控件中的默认控件相同 。The property sets the inherited property from the control, so that the default control that receives the focus within the control is the same as the default in the base control. 类还具有两个重要的方法。The class also has two important methods. 方法会重写类中的基方法 。The method overrides the base method from the class. 此方法非常重要，因为它可以从 它正在编辑的控件获取属性值并将其分配给编辑器控件中的字段。This method is critical because it enables getting the property values from the control it is editing and assigning them to the fields in the editor control. 方法也很重要，因为它采用用户在编辑控件中设置的值，并更新正在编辑的控件上的这些属性值。The method is also important, because it takes the values set by the user in the editing controls, and updates those property values on the control being edited. 在大多数情况下， 应通过声明 `` 元素内的元素 `` （该元素又包含在网页中的 `` 元素）来使用页持久性格式。In most cases the control should be used in page persistence format by declaring an `` element inside a `` element, which is in turn contained by an `` element on a Web page. 若要编辑控件的其他属性和行为 ，可以使用 随 Web 部件控件集提供的其他控件。To edit other properties and behavior of controls, you can use the other controls supplied with the Web Parts control set. 这些控件包括 、 和 。These controls include the , the , and the . 提供的 控件应提供编辑控件所需的大多数编辑功能 ，但也可以通过从类继承来创建自定义编辑器控件 。The supplied controls should provide most editing features required to edit controls, but you can also create a custom editor control by inheriting from the class. 有关代码示例，请参阅 类概述主题。For a code example, see the class overview topic. > [!NOTE] > 为了提高可访问性， 控件在元素中呈现 `
` 。To improve accessibility, the control is rendered within a `
` element. `
`元素对用于在控件中进行编辑的相关控件集进行分组 ，并为视觉对象 (（例如普通 Web 浏览器) 和面向语音的用户代理 (如屏幕阅读软件) ）简化了选项卡式导航。The `
` element groups the related set of controls used for editing in the control, and it facilitates tabbed navigation among those controls for both visual (such as ordinary Web browsers) and speech-oriented user agents (such as screen-reading software). ## 可访问性Accessibility 默认情况下，为此控件呈现的标记可能不符合辅助功能标准，例如 Web 内容可访问性准则 1.0 (WCAG) 优先级1指导原则。The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines. 有关此控件的辅助功能支持的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET 控件和辅助功能](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140))。For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在网页上声明控件，并使其能够编辑控件的多个 UI 属性 。The following code example demonstrates how to declare an control on a Web page, and enable it to edit several UI properties of a control. 此代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 使您能够在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 包含 控件和控件的网页 ，以及对自定义控件的引用 。A Web page that contains an control and an control, along with a reference to a custom control. - 一个包含自定义控件的类 。A class that contains a custom control. - 说明如何在浏览器中加载页面时工作。An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser. 该用户控件的源代码来自其他主题。The source code for the user control comes from another topic. 要使此代码示例正常运行，你需要从 [演练：更改 Web 部件页上的显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0) 主题中获取该用户控件的 .ascx 文件，并将该文件放在此代码示例中 .aspx 页面所在的同一文件夹中。For this code example to work, you need to obtain the .ascx file for the user control from the [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0) topic, and place the file in the same folder as the .aspx page in this code example. 此代码示例的第二部分是网页。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 它包含对控件的声明性引用 ，其中包含一个子 `` 元素，其中包含对控件的声明性引用 。It contains a declarative reference to an control, with a child `` element that contains declarative references to an control. 此外，页面还引用自定义 控件，并使用 `Register` 程序集指令和 `` 控件的元素。Also, the page references the custom control, using a `Register` directive for the assembly, and the `` element for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview/CS/appearanceeditorpartcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview/VB/appearanceeditorpartvb.aspx#1)] 此代码示例的第三部分是一个名为的自定义 类 `TextDisplayWebPart` ，在网页中被引用。The third part of the code example is a custom class named `TextDisplayWebPart`, which is referenced in the Web page. 要使代码示例运行，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅 [演练：开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#3)] 当你在浏览器中加载页面时，可以在 "**显示模式**" 下拉控件中选择 "**编辑模式**" 以切换到编辑模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the **Display Mode** drop-down control to switch to edit mode. 您可以单击谓词菜单 (控件标题栏中的向下箭头) `TextDisplayWebPart` ，然后单击 " **编辑** " 以编辑控件。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 编辑 UI 可见后，可以看到 控件。When the editing UI is visible, you can see the control. 如果在编辑 UI 中进行一些更改，并单击 " **应用** " 按钮，则可以使用 " **显示模式** " 下拉列表将页面返回到浏览模式，并查看编辑更改的完整效果。If you make some changes in the editing UI and click the **Apply** button, you can use the **Display Mode** drop-down list to return the page to browse mode and see the full effect of the editing changes.

summary.span: 将 控件的值保存到关联 控件的相应属性。

span.span: Saves the values from an control to the corresponding properties in the associated control.

returns.span: 如果将值从 控件保存到 控件的操作成功，则为 ；否则（如果出现错误）为 。

span.span: if the action of saving values from the control to the control is successful; otherwise (if an error occurs), .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是控件上的关键方法 。The method is a critical method on a control. 当用户在编辑用户界面 (UI) 中单击表示 "确定" 或 "应用" 谓词的按钮时，将调用此方法。It is called when the user clicks a button representing an OK or an apply verb in the editing user interface (UI). 此方法的目的是将用户在控件上设置的值保存 到关联控件中的相应属性 。The method's purpose is to save the values a user has set on an control to the corresponding properties in the associated control. 关联的控件在继承的属性中引用 。The associated control is referenced in the inherited property. 此 方法尝试设置关联控件上的以下属性 ：The method attempts to set the following properties on the associated control: - - - - - -

exception.span: 为正在编辑的 控件的以下任一属性设置值时发生错误：

span.span: An error occurs when setting the value for any of the following properties on the control that is being edited:
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

summary.span: 重写从 控件继承的基属性以在设计器中隐藏该属性，并防止它受主题影响。

span.span: Overrides the base property inherited from the control to hide the property from designers and prevent it from being affected by themes.

summary.span: 尽管此属性是公共的，但它用于此控件的默认呈现，不应从开发人员代码调用。

span.span: Though it is public, this property is used for default rendering of this control and is not intended to be called from developer code.

value.span: 一个字符串，该字符串包含接收 控件中的默认焦点的 控件的 ID。

span.span: A string that contains the ID of the control that receives the default focus in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 从 控件检索属性值并将这些属性值分配给关联 控件。

span.span: Retrieves the property values from a control and assigns them to the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是控件上的关键方法 。The method is a critical method on an control. 它实现基类中的 方法，检索关联控件中的当前值 ，并使用这些值更新控件中的控件， 以便用户可以对其进行编辑。It implements the method from the base class, retrieves the current values from the associated control, and updates the controls in the control with those values so a user can edit them. 只要关联控件中的值发生更改，就会调用方法 。The method is called whenever the values in the associated control might have changed. 对于 控件， 包含控件的区域将调用 方法，以使控件中的值 始终与关联控件中的值同步 。For an control, the zone that contains the control calls the method, so that the values in the control are always synchronized with the values in the associated control. 调用方法的另一种情况 是在 控件进入编辑模式时。Another case where the method is called is when a control is entering edit mode.

para.span: Web 部件控件集在 继承的方法中调用方法 ，因此，如果在用户上次查看控件之前，用户上次查看控件之前发生了任何更改 (例如，共享管理用户对控件所做的更改将影响所有用户) ，则在编辑过程中，这些更改将会很明显。

span.span: The Web Parts control set calls the method within the inherited method, so that if any changes occurred after the user last viewed the control prior to editing (for example, a shared administrative user made changes to the control that would affect all users), those changes would be evident during the editing process.

para.span: 如果创建自定义控件，则可以遵循相同的方法，并 从继承的方法调用方法， 以确保同步任何干预更改，但不需要执行此操作。

span.span: If you create a custom control, you can follow the same approach, and call the method from the inherited method to ensure that any intervening changes are synchronized, but it is not necessary to do this.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: public override string Title { get; set; }
.property instance string Title
Public Overrides Property Title As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Title { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Title : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置编辑器控件的标题。

span.span: Gets or sets a title for the editor control.

value.span: 用作控件标题的字符串。

span.span: A string that is used as the title of the control.

value.span: 默认值是 Web 部件控件集提供的、计算出的控件名称。

span.span: The default value is a calculated control name supplied by the Web Parts control set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件在编辑模式中可见时，属性值显示在控件的标题栏中。The property value is displayed in the title bar of an control when the control is visible in edit mode. 在页面中声明控件时，可以为属性设置一个值 `Title` 。When the control is declared in a page, you can set a value for the `Title` attribute. 如果未提供标题的值，则使用特定于区域性的默认值描述此控件允许用户编辑的属性类型。If you do not supply a value for the title, a culture-specific default value is used to describe the kinds of properties that this control allows users to edit. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性的用法 。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码，请参阅类概述主题的 "示例" 部分 。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 此代码示例演示如何在 `` 页中声明元素时，设置页持久性格式的标题。The code example shows how to set the title in page persistence format when the `` element is declared in a page. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview/CS/appearanceeditorpartcs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview/VB/appearanceeditorpartvb.aspx#2)] 在浏览器中加载页面时，可以在 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件中选择 "**编辑模式**" 以切换到编辑模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch to edit mode. 您可以单击谓词菜单 (控件标题栏中的向下箭头) `TextDisplayWebPart` ，然后单击 " **编辑** " 以编辑控件。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 编辑用户界面 (UI) 可见时，可以看到 控件的自定义标题。When the editing user interface (UI) is visible, you can see the control's custom title.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls
